title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Simpson Desert, Australia
content:
Photo submitted by David Lloyd, “my wife, Amanda Cleife, dropping the boys on a sand dune climb in the middle of Australia (Simpson Desert – driest place in Australia) – we use fatbikes mostly for sand out here but also on snow for a few months of the year. We had 80km straight of these […]

author: Kristi Benedict
